mapper.select: SELECT eventId, type, category , detail , note , eventDate , amount, ssVersion FROM T_SMP_Event WHERE eventDate BETWEEN #{from,jdbcType=DATE} AND #{to,jdbcType=DATE} AND ssIsDelete = 0

SELECT ev.type, cv.valueText AS itemText , SUM(ev.amount) AS amount FROM T_SMP_Event AS ev INNER JOIN M_SMP_CommonValues AS cv ON ev.category = cv.keyValue WHERE ev.eventDate BETWEEN #{from,jdbcType=DATE} AND #{to,jdbcType=DATE} AND ev.ssIsDelete = 0 AND ev.type = #{type} GROUP BY ev.type, ev.category, cv.valueText Order by ev.type, ev.category
